revised_title: Development of a Method for Copying Plane Gratings
tldr: The authors describe the development of a new method for copying plane diffraction gratings using a plastic pellicle to transfer the grating's cast to a gelatine surface. They discuss the process of obtaining a homogeneous pellicle and an optically flat gelatine surface, and present the results of their experiments, showing that the diffracted wave-fronts of the parent and replica gratings agree to a fraction of a fringe.
